content.detailedDescription: I was outside at night on porch watching clouds took picture of two ufos one had gteen lights other had red lights there is no other visible objects that could make it false ni don't live near a airport so its not towers it was ufos.
content.summary: Storm was coming in took picture of two ufos

content.detailedDescription: Outside with the dogs and looked towards the west. saw a strobe flash twice (with maybe 10 second gap) then nothing. a little more nw of the strobe were flashing red, blue, green lights hovering, then moving slightly, then hovering again. meanwhile something white streaked across the sky super fast towards the lights. couldn't tell if it was a meteor or something related to it. then looked towards the north and noticed a small white light way up, size of a star that would flash like a plane but then made 90 degree turn. myself and 3 others were witness and just seemed very different. the red, green and blue lighted object slowly moved away towards the nw out of our sightline. this lasted about a half hour. don't know what to make of all this but have never seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw strobes, longer object w/ red/blue and greem lights, also small white light made sharp turns

content.detailedDescription: First observed two flashing lights moving in a very strange way almost dancing at times they would get really intense. they would change direction very repidly moving up and down in varous way across the horizon. then viewd through binoculars both lights were independent almost looked as if it was two jets practising dog fights like barrel rolls and such but at such incredable speed and angles...They would change their flight pattern very abruptly. they remained in the same patch of sky for close to three hrs at least. i woke my wife to witness them as well and she got freaked out as well.
content.summary: 2 independant set of blinking flashing lights (police colours) moving unlike a plane/jet or helicopter/ or satelite

content.detailedDescription:
Sept 23rd 2013 7:50pm i noticed a bright white light hovering over scarborough near eglinton ave and markham rd .
the object sat there for about an hour and a half then desends and slowly moves south at no more then 20 klm.
at first i thought satellite but then i noticed a cloud pass behind it and last time i checked planes didn't hover.
sept 24th  2013 at 8pm i noticed the light again repeating the same pattern as the night before. 
if your in the area look south west and who knows you might see it.
attached are 2 digital photos i took from sept 24th 2013.
the first photo shows the starlike object hovering and the 2nd photo shows the object leaving in a west direction towards the dvp.
content.summary: 2 night white light event

content.detailedDescription: Bright light in the sw sky appeared to be towards channahon il. from my house in mokena.. i watched it for 15 minutes as i sat by my front door. it sort of appeared to be moving as i thought it was an incoming airplane to midway airport but then it just hovered at a stand still. as i sat by my front door watching the object i gauged it with a roof line for movement. it's movement (if any) was extremly slow maybe drifting towards the right from where i was at. i know the flight patterns and paths here as i see planes all the time. this wasn���t on any normal path to midway airport and why it caught my attention. i grabbed my camera and snapped a few shots. they came out dark but i lightened them up as much as i could. after 3 photos. the object started to desend below the roof tops to where i couldn���t see it anymore. the estimated size of the object i can't determine because of the distance between my observation point and the object itself. i can say with certainty that this was not a candle kite by no means. i am an observer of the skies since my first sighting in the early 70's. since then, i observed 5 sightings in which i have no explanation.
content.summary: Bright light hovered seemed to move somewhat gaugeing with roofline dimmed in/out then decended below roofline.

content.detailedDescription: Looking into the night sky i looked at the stars and notices a couple jetliners an normal altitude flying easterly, at the same time i noticed something much higher and brighter moving and continued to watch it for over and hour invited friends to witness , no clue , not like anything we had ever recognized in the night sky, i continued to watch it circle in a counter clockwise direction at the same altitude and same flight path for over and hour and a half and then it seemed to just dissipate. ever once in a while it would project bright white flashes on what appeared to be the the north to south turn coming back towards colorado springs. it would make movements like a snake sometimes and then stop. and then take off like instantly at full cruising speed then sometimes really speed up unlike anything i have ever seen . not sure if military was testing something can someone talk to the air traffic control and see what they had on radar at that time as it was something abnormal. normally you can always hear a jet as it flies at normal cruising altitude as i did hear several during and after the event, but this object had no sound whatsoever in the night sky and it is normally quiet enough to hear all jetliners flying over. i believe it to be either top secret or unknown to mankind as an avid observer of all aircraft being brought up with an air force family.
content.summary: Noticed object circling an area along the front range over 30,000 ft , looking like a flashing star in the night  maybe a 100 mile diameter  same circling for over an hour, friends witnessed also and it would stop and change directions unlike conventiona

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to lock my car in the driveway, afterward i went to the backyard to look at the stars. i was looking up to he northwest and two white star like objects caught my eye.
they were in a staggered flight path going from the northwest to the south. at first i thought that these might have been planes at high altitude or satellites but as they were flying the trailing object made what i guess i would call circular movements near the object in front and then both accelerated and eventually disappeared
content.summary: Two white objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back porch having a smoke sitting in a chair. it was almost 3 am.I'm also an amateur astronomer and was watching the stars. then i noticed, straight up, a huge boomerang shaped craft. it had rows of light on or near the leading edge. there had to be 10 or so lights all in a row on the leading edge, that make 5 or 6 lights on each side forming a boomerang shape. it was moving extremely fast moving due south coming from the north right over denver. from the time i seen it until it faded to the south was only 3 or 4 seconds. it's size was huge. it had to have some altitude because the lights were not vary bright. if i held my fist up at arm's length it would be nearly two fist's wide and no sound at all. that wide and that high up it had to be over 500 feet across or better. the speed of the craft must have been over 1000 mph by how fast it moved to the south. it was an amazing sight. i called denver pd to see if any one reported it and no had at that time. i stayed out to see if i seen it again. at 4:10 a small craft with two lights came from the north west heading sse. it had only two lights but was moving vary fast. atleast three times the speed of any airplane. i seen many airplanes go by the hole time i was out there. this one seemed to be heading twords the one that went by earlier. the speed of the small one was what stood about it. it was a moving along. this one faded as it moved south ward. this one lasted around 5 or 6 seconds.
content.summary: Vary large boomarang shaped with maybe 10 lights on leading edge

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was letting my dog out to "go".
2-3. it stood out from the stars it was very bright and then i saw it move a little
4. it appeared to kinda hover but wobble about slowly. it was moving far to slowly to be a plane and was far to high up, i have seen many planes pass by we do have a small airport near champagne. it was one color a white light looks just like other stars but as time lapsed it grew dimmer could have been moving more to the southeast and i just couldn't tell at the time but it did start to go more north not sure on the direction it was to my right facing southeast going toward the moon. the thing that made me feel it was not a satellite was that i observed other very much smaller bits of light approach and leave from the larger ball of light i ran to get my telescope to focus on it but its very old and cheap a kids model and all i could see though it was a ball of light that looked like a white version of a traffic light. so it was very far up and my telescope is no help at all.

it was there for about half an hour or more i kept going back outside to see what other changes to its movement i could determine until it just wasn't there. ill admit my eye sights not the best so i have to determine what things are from behavior and speed and im sure it was no plane, still a possibility to have been a satellite but that doesn't explain the other smaller balls of light that went to and from


i know this i probably not very helpful information but i felt strongly enough about it that something needed to be said.
content.summary: Ball of light

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Younot evdinder alien bat of sightings report bat over over over sightings ladings  3:45
content.shape: Cigar,   Cone,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: Flyings big ligth

content.detailedDescription: In ladings report now bsat see one  a go bat you cray  move wen hhey see  is abduction in 7:45 pm or am abduction time
content.summary: In sightings alien ufo bat over 6 time

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on cimmaron and highway 24 toward woodland park direction and was stop at a red light at the intersection of 24 and 21 street getting ready too turn left on 21 street. i seen this black ball that was moving at a steady speed but fast over the waldo burn scar area in colorado springs, colorado. it wasn't a balloon because it was moving straight then made a turn in a head wind coming over the mountains. we had wind gust up to 50 plus mph that day. i first notice this object because it was in my main line of sight. the first thing that came to my mind about this object was it was different than anything i seen before. this object was black and it was still day light outside. it seem to be under control and made a turning move over the mountains. i kept telling my daughter do you see that black ball moving in the sky. she said she seen it also. the object just vanish in the area.
content.summary: Black ball moving fast over the mountains toward waldo canyon.

content.detailedDescription:
I pulled into the walmart parking lot in arvada co to make a phone call, looking east over the horizon, i saw three large lights moving in various patterns, one formation was chevron, then stacked vertically, at least two of the lights slowly blinked out and then blinked back on.

the lights appeared at times to be boomerang shaped and bobbing and weaving at times.

i do not know if there is a rational reason for the ligths but just wanted to report incase anyone else saw or knows what i witnessed.

the changing formations make it difficult to have been a plane or helicopter as the it would have been difficult to impossible to achieve.

mufon, please let me know if there is an explanation or if others have reported it.

thank you!
content.summary: Three boomerang shaped lights dancing

content.detailedDescription: I was facing south west, the object was moving nw to se. i was in fairless hills shopping center parking lot coming out of gamestop and saw it directly over wells fargo bank moving slowly. i noticed it when it lit up. it flashed on for a second. i could still see it when it wasn't lit up but only the outline of it. it had no lights like a plane, helicopter or blimp would. no red, green or white lights at all. just a dark outline. i watched to see if it would light up again. it flashed on two more times but not as bright or as long as the first time. the 4th and last time i saw it flash on seemed like the brightest longest flash.I was watching for 3-4 minutes total. i should have watched longer but i was in a rush. the amber,pinkish,orangeish color lit up the entire cigar shape and the light was vibrating or pulsating a little. it was far away from me because it was only the size of a pill in the sky. it only moved half the length of the bank the whole time i watched so it was very slow. i saw the despicable me blimp a couple days ago and this was nothing like that. like i said before it was way to skinny and long shaped to be a blimp plus no running lights. i watch the sky all the time. my dad and grandfather are both pilots. ive been flying in and around airplanes my hole life. i had my contacts in and have 20/20 with the in. this was definitely out of the ordinary.
content.summary: thought it could be a blimp but it was way to long & skinnythe entire cigar shape lit up amber/pink/orange,no other lights or colors very random blinking it blinked on for only a second , 3-4 times in the 4 minutes i watched.Saw outline while not lit

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were out taking motion photos over the qew on the traffic. well we didnt notice anything at the time but when we got home we were going over all the photos that we had taken tonight and noticed that triangle in the photo. this shot  was done with a cannon photograghy camera and was set up for a 8 second photo. this would make moving objects blury. those 3 lights that form the shape of a triangle showed up in 4 other photos. not to sure if it is what it looks like so i thought i would share and googled where to send this photo so here it is.
content.summary: Notice strange object in 4 8second motion pics

content.detailedDescription:
It was june 1996. i was driving home with 3 friends from sunnyside washington to granger washington. it was around 3pm . it was a very hot, clear sky day.We were driving east on yakima valley highway ride outside of the paul- mason dairy in sunnyside washington. nobody was really talking to each other , as the heat was miserable . i light up a cigarette, blew out the smoke and looked out the window.There hovering above the dairy was a large silver ball.
i looked at it hard for a second, then asked my friends if the saw too? my friends looked at what i was looking at and one of my friends said " dude its a ufo!". it was hovering about 100-150 feet off the ground, making a slow vibrating sound. we watched it for about 1-2 mintues before the sound stoped ,and the object disapeared in the blink of an eye.As we arrived to granger,the object reappeared for about 30 seconds be it disapeared again.We got home and told our parents and afew other friends but the thought we had made it up. i had heard about cattle mutilations happening in the night before , but never during the day . i did not see any mutilations that day because we were just driving the dairy . but i have always found it weird that a ufo would be hovering above a large cattle dairy in the bight daytime.
content.summary: It was a large round silver ball hovering over a large cow farm.

content.detailedDescription:
It was june 1996. i was driving home with 3 friends from sunnyside washington to granger washington. it was around 3pm . it was a very hot, clear sky day.We were driving east on yakima valley highway ride outside of the paul- mason dairy in sunnyside washington. nobody was really talking to each other , as the heat was miserable . i light up a cigarette, blew out the smoke and looked out the window.There hovering above the dairy was a large silver ball.
i looked at it hard for a second, then asked my friends if the saw too? my friends looked at what i was looking at and one of my friends said " dude its a ufo!". it was hovering about 100-150 feet off the ground, making a slow vibrating sound. we watched it for about 1-2 mintues before the sound stoped ,and the object disapeared in the blink of an eye.As we arrived to granger,the object reappeared for about 30 seconds be it disapeared again.We got home and told our parents and afew other friends but the thought we had made it up. i had heard about cattle mutilations happening in the night before , but never during the day . i did not see any mutilations that day because we were just driving the dairy . but i have always found it weird that a ufo would be hovering above a large cattle dairy in the bight daytime.
content.summary: It was a large round silver ball hovering over a large cow farm.

content.detailedDescription:
My son was walking the dog and came into the house to tell me he saw ufos.  we went out in the backyard and for a twenty minute period we witnessed approximately 50 triangular objects with blinking lights flying overhead in a northeasterly direction.  there were two to five visible at any given time over this period.

they were not directly over our heads, but as we looked ne, some were to our left, and some were to our right.  we could turn to the se and pick out new ones, and follow them as they flew out of sight to the ne.

we think they were triangular because they generally had three lights.  the lights allowed us to see the solidity of the objects.  the objects were moving in the direction of a side of the triangle; a point of the triangle was in the rear.  the rearmost light was blinking while the front two were steady.  there seemed to be more than just the three lights that defined the triangle.

their flight was straight and steady.  a single object would take about four minutes or so from initial sighting in the se to going out of sight in the ne.
content.summary: Multiple triangular craft flying slowly in ne direction

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog, i saw a rare very bright "star" it was huge compared to the stars around. the walk took about 5 min, and the "start" did not change at all, not in size, light nor position. i went inside my house to take my ipad to look at it with a constellation app,  when i went back to look at it, i was surprised it wasn't there anymore.
content.summary: Very bright, huge compared with a start besides it.

content.detailedDescription: Took picture
content.summary: Pear shaped bright light, moving at speed of a comercial airplain but much larger, also short trail

content.detailedDescription:
While i was in my backyard recording the moon with my telescope and my laptop on aug 17 th 13 i noticed two quick flashes ( i though i saw it, it was so fast) and the next day when i review it, this is what i saw: a light that seems to stop and go, stop and go and you can see the streak behind it.

the original video is about 20-25 min long. the segment on you tube is 50 sec. long and the light appears around 24 sec. i hope that with your editing knowledge you can enhance the video.

please let me know whatever your opinion is about it. this is real i dont know anything about video editing otherwise i would have zoomed in and slow it down.

this is the you tube web address:


[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]


thanks and i would really appreciate any comments about it (pos. or neg.).

[name removed/cms/tg]

(pardon my english - is my second language-)
content.summary: I was recording the moon when a fast flashing light came across my telescope

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on 275 when i saw a dark circular object about 300' in the air it was hovering for about 3 seconds then it slowly descended se traveling around 35 mph and it was wobbling kind of like a deflated balloon it was 1/3 size of a hot air balloon. it was about 100' above ground when i lost it. i witnessed it for about 10 seconds. all the way home i was thinking of what it could be and i still have not come up with a conclusion.  i live near an airport and it was not a hot air balloon was not a airplane was not a helicopter that is for sure . i thought maybe a drone or quad rotor but it was too big. when i saw it it was about 1/4 mile away from me getting closer as i went north on 275. the sun had almost gone down and it was getting dark but not dark enough to turn my head lights on almost like a bad storm was coming kind of darkness so i could see it very good. no lights no metallic shiny finish just flat black. when it was moving and decsending it looked like a wobbling penut and it looked oval at one point. if any one saw this i want to know what it is or was.
content.summary: Hovering at 300' then quickly decsended 35 mph while wobbling se very dark 1/3 size of hot air ballon 100' when i lost it

content.detailedDescription: Not like any aircraft ive ever seen. seemed to have two sets of wings like a capital h. significantly larger than a 747. being escorted by a standard commercial type aircraft to the west. the two crafts cruised at approx 25,000 feet right along the coast. they continued north until out of sight.
content.summary: Large square or h shaped plane like craft escorted by normal plane. flying south to north.

content.detailedDescription: (6am) sat. sept. 21,2013  i was putting my dog in backyard and was so surprised by the beautiful bright light that lit up my yard and roof top of my neighbors house. as i went out and closed my door i reached in and turned the patio light off as it interfered with the beauty of the moon light. my first thought was wow god is shinning down upon us his beauty and creation. i stood outside upon my open patio looking up at the stars- the dippers and the moon which really was not completely full. it was a clear night no clouds. after about 4 min, i glanced over towards the east and my neighbors roof and i saw the boomerang shaped craft. it was large and seemed to appear out of nowhere. i just froze and watched it. my dog did not seem affected or did not see it. it moved very slowly to the south out over my roof and trees and line of vision. i was surprised by its size and how close it was and low.  the boomerang shape was smooth beige or reflective, it had no lights or sound. i walked back into my yard to try and follow it visually  but could see over my roof and house. i just stood in shock. within 15sec in the south sky at a great distance i saw a flash of light which i thought was a shooting star. i went in my house and did not wake anyone. i felt disbelief and confusion but not fear. i have now told my family and they are not completely sure of what i have seen. i live close to dfw and a navel base. i have questioned if it could of been a flock of birds at (6am) or a weather balloon or some type of military craft. i have never believed in ufo's but now i have to consider it.
content.summary: Boomerrang shape - large-beige or light metal that reflected moonlight- no sound or lights

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine from silverton called me around 7:50pm to tell me to look outside. he said he could see these orange lights flying over his neighborhood and wondered if i could see them from where i was (i live close by in a different neighborhood.) i couldn't see anything in that direction, so i hopped in my car and headed to his house (approx 4-5 minute trip). before reaching his house, i could see two of the orange, glowing orbs overhead. they seemed low flying, maybe a few hundred feet above the houses. once i was at his house, we saw 3-4 more traveling in the same direction. they followed almost the exact same path each time, coming one at a time and traveling out towards the bay. before i arrived, he said he saw about 20-30, some moving in pairs, slowing down, stopping and then continuing on. the whole event lasted about 10-15 minutes after i arrived. i have a somewhat low quality video taken on my phone of an object in motion. they were moving at a constant speed, neither very fast or very slow.
content.summary: Many orange orbs flying in a straight path.

content.detailedDescription: Working on my back porch at noon, i spied a white/silver object moving sse just past a neighbor's tree. it was round, slightly elliptical to the naked eye, like a fat blimp or pinched orb, but completely silent and moving very quickly. it seemed solid. it hovered for a second and changed direction from its slight ascent sse, to a steady altitude heading ssw. my first thought was a border drone, but it was far too big and round to be such, also silent for how close it was. i live in a town where air traffic is very rare, and the jets and helicopters that do fly over town are loud loud loud. i retrieved my phone and took a few hurried pictures before it went behind the tree. i ran around to the other side of the tree and glimpsed it briefly before it disappeared, heading west again. when i looked at the pictures, there was also a triangular object captured in one photo, but i did not see or notice it during the sighting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White/silver object, elliptical, moving silently, quickly sse, then changed directions and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
While bird hunting in washington state.  3 persons, on a mountain at chelan butte,washington ( near the day wireless systems facility). all three witnesses heard turbine engine type noise that sounded like a helicopter approaching. as they turned around, expecting to see a helicopter, what they saw appeared to be a giant white colored dandelion looking object about 40 ft. in diameter. it passed within appox. 1,500' from the witnesses.
 the object stopped in a hover next to the large antenna's of the day wireless facility. it then continued to hovered, just above the ground, rotating slowly in a stationary position for about 5 min. , then departed at high rate of speed. 

   this sighting took place on september 5, 2013 around 3 pm.
content.summary: Large dandandelion looking object

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Driving down 104 westbound, i noticed that it appeared that there was a diagonal line of bright planet-like lights in the west sky. initially, i thought it was venus, but looking towards the southwest, i could see venus shining bright white, while these orbs seemed reddish-orange. i thought then that it was possibly mars, but thought that was visible in the east and only later in the evening so i wanted to check.

i grabbed my phone to open the skymap app that i have and as i did, i noticed that the center "planet" had started to rise in the sky and the one on the right began to move as well. they moved towards me in a direction from the west/northwest to east/northeast. they were moving much faster than a plane and the light emitted grew brighter and did not pulsate or flash. 

both orbs moved at similar speeds and stayed equidistant from each other on their path and they disappeared over my car towards the east. the objects weren't as high as plane high up but they were higher than a plane coming in to land at the local airport. i couldn't see any distinct shape other than the circular light and i did have my glasses on.
content.summary: 2 dusty red orbs hovering above horizon then flew towards east keeping to similar paths

content.detailedDescription:
I was sneaking into a music festival called symbiosis outside of modesto on that evening and looked up at the full moon that was illuminating a light fog over the area. the music festival had several stages with lots of electronic music and lazers...It was at a local resevoir/state park. when i looked up i saw a triangular craft which looked very large. it was difficult to judge the size and the light fog made it appear duller than it might have been- the lights might have actually been a lot brighter on the underside of the craft. it moved quietly (the music was loud, so i cant tell if it was silent, though based on how gracefully it moved and quickly, it seemed like it was silent. it moved from the northeast to the northwest across the entire sky in under 5-10 seconds. it reminded me of a ufo seen on nightvision, a triangular one that moved with steady lights across the sky. i saw this clip on youtube, but this craft was much larger. i saw it in perspective, seeing a perspective view of it from the underside as it moved across the sky...I just had a really awesome feeling after watching it- it was awe-inspiring, and beautiful. 

for a moment i thought maybe the lights from the show caught its attention. but it appeared to come from the sierras (mountain range) and went across the entire sky. 

i came here to see if anyone saw it, please contact me if others did...

and i was not on any drugs or alcohol.
content.summary: Appeared to be very large, maybe several football fields, triangular by the light pattern, maybe 7-9 lights on underside

content.detailedDescription: I drive this route everynite,heading north from hannibal,mo on hiway 61.  just south of lagrainge,mo i noticed an orb or starlike object moving north,not fast really,maybe 200 to 300 mph.It kept heading north,then split into 3 objects into a perfect triangle never stopping or hovering.  proceeded north,for maybe 30 to 60 seconds,then all 3 broke formation in maybe 2 seconds,heading in different directions.15 to 20 min's later the sky was covered with aircraft maybe 3 to 5 aircraft (with)navigation lights.That lasted about 1 to 2 hours.It was kind a funny,they new something was heading thier way and scrammed the heck outa there!It's a pretty rural area,and i've never noticed that many aircraft at that time of day or nite.
content.summary: From single object traveling norht,to 3 object's into a perfect triangle
